name: Ilenar
description:
Hello everyone!

 I am Bence and with my friend Álmos, we are work together in our team on a Turn-based strategy game, inspired by the famous Heroes of Might & Magic series. Our current project, called Ilenar, is a three years old massive development, already reach the pre-alpha version. We want to bring back life and fun to the genre of TBS styled games and build up a giant world with lots of adventure!

THE GAME

Ilenar is a sci-fi turn-based strategy game whit role playing elements, that is placed in the distant future in a post-apocalyptic universe. It is expected that six different factions will be able to fight and submerge planets.

THE PLOT

'In the beginning, it was light. They did not recognize its strength for a long time, they were not looking for power from the sky, the source of energy. When they realized that they did not had to look down and search, rather their eyes were in the sky highlighted. When they tried to utilize solar energy, it was too late. Humanity came to see it late there is a stronger source than ever, which is constantly growing. It was late because the Earth was already became uninhabitable and the dominant race almost extinct. They do not have a lot of chances because the layer on their home planet, which protected them from the incomprehensible and unprocessed force, its slowly destroyed, disappeared. To escape, they had to move. Anyone who lived on Earth has no escape from death. War wounded at that time everywhere, there was no rest for anyone. The environment was ravaged and the animals were wiped out. Materialistic and power minded creatures have dominated everything. There is no other way, but the balance of the equilibrium straightened. The Earth had to be abandoned, but the humanity was not enough to do it. They needed to hurry. In the ancient wars, they saw the shelter below the ground to survive all the blows, but they again looked in the wrong direction. The only solution to escape is the way to the stars. They had to move on, the only option being the Cassius project. Before the atomic war and global warming would have destroyed everything, a smaller group managed to leave the planet and set off for a long journey to find a new home. They did not know it what's waiting for them ... '

--The Hallow Book of Extrusion

DEVLOG

The game is now heavily under development.

Most games what are made in Gmks or Gmks2 need a Directx End-User support to run properly, you can download the setup from here: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/confirmation.aspx?id=35

We would be happy to accept positive and negative reviews and we are curious to how do you like the game so far.

The game have English subtitles. A játék Magyar feliratot is tartalmaz.

Special thanks for our enthusiastic testers! @ktzRslow - @benderz2 - @dudewhitbrain - @TriangleSquare - @DeadStabb (https://gamejolt.com/@S-A-U-S)

All of our testers are will get an exclusive place in the credits list of the game! Send us an e-mail if you interested about the game and if you wish to be a tester too!

We still waiting for more and more feedback!
